name: jupp, programmer’s editor — JOE flavour
description: This package contains symbolic links to replace the Debian joe package using the jupp package’s JOE implementation (binaries and manpages). It also contains the appropriate conffiles and, in contrast to Debian’s joe flavour, supports SELinux context copying (on Debian systems with the Linux kernel), and has many bugs fixed and makes some of jupp’s new features available to the joe, jstar, jmacs, jpico and rjoe flavours.
